text: Everyone who would rather fight one horse-sized duck than a hundred duck-sized horses.
Everyone who would rather have a rewind button for their life than a pause button.
Everyone who would rather be able to talk to animals than speak all human languages.
Everyone who would rather have a personal chef than a personal chauffeur.
Everyone who would rather live in a world without cheese than a world without chocolate.
Everyone who would rather always be 10 minutes late than 20 minutes early.
Everyone who would rather have a photographic memory than be a super genius.
Everyone who would rather give up social media or give up music for a year.
Everyone who would rather have the ability to fly or the ability to be invisible.
Everyone who would rather find true love or win the lottery.
